name: IssuerRegistry
description: Algorand Smart Contract for Issuer Registry - Manages authorized credential issuers with temporal revocation support

methods.name: add_issuer
methods.description: Add a new authorized issuer to the registry

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to add

args.name: full_name
args.description: Full legal name of the issuer

methods.name: revoke_issuer
methods.description: Revoke authorization for an issuer (admin only)

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to revoke

methods.name: reinstate_issuer
methods.description: Reinstate a previously revoked issuer (admin only)

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to reinstate

args.name: credential_id
args.description: ID of the credential to revoke

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer who issued the credential

methods.name: query_issuer
methods.description: Query the status of an issuer

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to query

methods.name: query_credential
methods.description: Query the status of a credential

args.name: credential_id
args.description: ID of the credential to query

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to update

args.name: issuer_address
args.description: Address of the issuer to query
